attributes.title: Absolutely horrible.
attributes.review: I can’t even explain how bad this is. I’m speechless. Worst app ever downloaded on my phone by far.

attributes.title: My kitchen floor😽😋🤪😚😘
attributes.review: THIS IS THE HANDS DOEN WORST APP I HAVE EVER USED. I first downloaded the app expecting it to be so great. After I downloaded some dude called me and said he had some pet turtles for me and OBVIOUSLY 🙄 I went and THE DUDE kidnapped me and made me listen to I don’t mind by usher while he did the th Danielle Cohn dance IM NOW SCARRED 🙄😿 then when I finally escaped riding a kitten🧚🏻🧚🏻😾 I DELETED THE APP AND I CAN NOT BRLIVE ANYONE WOULD EVER DOENLOD IT. have a good day❤️🤪

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: As the good and loyal trump supporter I am I wanted t get this app to show my appreciation #trump2020 (I just learned hashtag was groovy)#keepamerikkkagreat anyways as soon as I git the app my screened turned black and said it was gonna delete all my pictures and important info and leak it, I thought it was a prank from sum stupid kid but then I checked my pictures and they where all deleted!!! I could not believe my eyes it was pure pictures of trumps teiner wiener it was otrocious!!!my wallpaper soon turned into his shrimps as well!Soon enough my whole phone was a shrine to president trumps teiner wiener!.

attributes.title: Dead Grandmother and now I am on run!!!
attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE! Not only did it give my 420 year old grandmother a heart attack, KILLING HER, but it also gave my dog explosive diarrhea! She completely crapped all over my grandmother’s ashes so now her urn is stinking up the entire house! So logically I threw it out the window cause I don’t want my house to smell how Donald Trump’s nudes look✨🌸🧚‍♀️✨!  And than the urn hit my neighbor on the head! He stopped breathing and got really cold so I put him in a fire to heat him up, as one does. Now I am on the run from the police for premeditated manslaughter! ACAB! Do not download this app!!!

attributes.title: Not working
attributes.review: This app took forever to download onto my potato of a phone like what the heck it makes me so frustrated

attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: This should be banned- this is an awful app, for an awful candidate who doesn’t deserve to run.

attributes.title: My iPad has never been slower
attributes.review: WARNING!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! I bought my iPad to receive photos of my new granddaughter. My son takes sweet photos of her in her little MAGA hat and shares them With me via iMessage. HOWEVER!!!! Ever since I downloaded the Trump 2020 app, I can’t access anything. Everything on my iPad has slowed down. It uses so much digital storage space apparently that I’m unable to watch any videos of my sweet grand baby rolling over for the first time 💔 MY IPAD MAY AS WELL BE IN THE TRASH CAN!!!!!! Trump promised to make this country great, but my experience with his app demonstrates otherwise. 🇺🇸 TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸 but STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP!!!!!!
